summary: Cleaned up 165 TypeScript errors that were blocking deployment, redesigned the header with unified Grove styling, and added a showcase for LogoSanctuary. The markdown editor is now simpler with a three-mode system, and we've backfilled 44 historical release summaries into the timeline.

features: redesign footer with overflow menu integration
add glass logo support and extended props
add vertical prop, add glass dividers to desktop footer
add clickable ZDR sub icons and help article
add Swarm sub icon for agentic swarm features
add Loam icon sub-component to Plant
update feature icons for outpost, scout, and trove
add What is Solarpunk? article and link from Workshop
add solarpunk links to Vision and Manifesto pages
Add floating icon navigation to workshop page
enhance GroveDivider with rotation and spacing props
update divider layout to horizontal and Hello icon
fixes: remove Svelte examples from HTML comment to fix SSR
add aria-labelledby to mobile menu sections, clarify footer comment
remove scroll-shadow causing black boxes on mobile
restore spool icon for Loom feature
change dividers from horizontal to vertical orientation
address security and regex issues in release summaries
add missing Tag icon import to roadmap page
revert workshop page regression and add TOC to main roadmap
resolve build errors and Svelte 5 deprecation warnings
improve dark mode styling and fix contrast issues
use consistent slate border in RoadmapPreview dark mode
display tools instead of subComponents in TOC
simplify backfill workflow to just workflow_dispatch
add job conditions to prevent conflicts
use Vite import.meta.glob for Cloudflare compatibility
refactoring: extract divider constants, add mobile menu scroll shadow
use svelte:element for sub icon rendering
rename Sway → Breeze, walk for diagram mode name
standardize pattern status to 'Applied' instead of 'Integrated/Implemented'
switch to DeepSeek V3.2 for release summaries
redesign workshop TOC with compact table layout
finalize Sway → Breeze, Fern → Trace rename
docs: add naming journey for Sway → Rustle rename
second naming walk for diagram mode - Frost emerges
third naming walk for diagram mode - Ridge emerges
fourth naming walk for diagram mode - Span emerges
update COMPLETED.md with swarm feature details
fifth naming walk for diagram mode - Sweep emerges
add Minimax M2/M2.1 to Kilo Code models
add Rebecca Gordon to Home Depot Family
tests: add comprehensive component tests, consolidate shared types
chores: update copyright to 2026, use glass dividers in mobile menu
